events.name: Is Earth Forming a New Ocean? Scientists Report Odd Pulses Coming From Deep Below the African Continent
events.description: Tectonic pulses beneath Africa are splitting the continent apart to produce a new ocean, according to University of Southampton scientists.

events.description:
Congratulations to the winner of our most recent prize draw, Jim Hecker, who is one of our valued Patreon supporters! generated_content.title: Historical Mysteries in Neuralink, Folsom Street - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Explore the mysterious Folsom Street in San Francisco, where a network of underground tunnels and hidden chambers has long been rumored to exist. As scientists report odd pulses coming from deep below the African continent, this enigmatic location continues to captivate tourists and curiosity seekers alike.
